about_the_game:
"Since ancient times, autumn has brought a sense of melancholy, yet I say autumn days surpass the spring." - Liu Yuxi, Tang Dynasty

It's the tail end of summer,
The air tinged with a different scent,
Han Hui, wandering alone in the mountains,
He Jia, who has always waited in the hills,
Their chance encounter,
Begins a journey solely theirs,
Unfolding a magenta fairy tale filled with the fragrance of mountain sweet osmanthus.
 

KEY FEATURES

  • Incorporates the visual resources from both the 2012 and 2014 versions, offering one game with two sets of memories.
  • All version graphics have been upgraded to a resolution of 2560x1440.
  • Re-sampled voiceovers of He Jia and Han Hui for improved sound quality; new recordings for Li Qiucheng and the Teahouse Manager.
  • The remade ED of the 2014 version is sharper and plays more smoothly.
  • Enhanced font rendering, better controller support, more language support.

Notice: The game selection box only pops up when launched through the Steam Library.
